On a Wednesday

Short interviews with people. On Wednesdays. Read why →

Ted

 Fort Greene Park

⏲ 11:50 a.m. on Wednesday, September 3

What are you doing today?

Well as soon as I’m done walking my dog, I’m going to go to work. I’m a carpenter and I work in the neighborhood here.

I walk her until late morning. Then I work until dusk. I go back and make dinner for me and my wife. Then, I have a drink and relax.

What's your favorite part of the day?

Probably having a drink at night. A glass of beer. Turning on the radio and listening to music with my wife. WQXR, classicical . We both agree on it. It’s neutral territory.

What are you doing tomorrow?

Same thing I’m doing today.

Made in New York City by Dave Dawson & Bekka Palmer.
